sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormsModule, ReactiveFormsModule} from '@angular/forms'; import {NgIf} from '@angular/common'; import {MatInputModule} from '@angular/material/input'; import {MatFormFieldModule} from '@angular/material/form-field'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], standalone: true, imports: [FormsModule, MatFormFieldModule, MatInputModule, ReactiveFormsModule, NgIf], }) export class LoginComponent { emailFormControl = new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]); }
Email Please enter a valid email address Email is required
